select t.id, t.fileName, t.tableName, t.allCounts, t.resetCounts, t.sucdessCounts, t.remark, t.phone, t.province, t.city, t.area, t.importLocal, t.createdate, (u.USERNAME)createid from t_import_record t left join t_sys_user u on t.createid=u.USER_ID where 1=1
and ( t.fileName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keyword}),'%') or t.phone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keyword}),'%') or t.province LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keyword}),'%') or t.city LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keyword}),'%') or t.area LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keyword}),'%') or t.importLocal LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keyword}),'%') )
and t.createdate LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.createdate}),'%')
and t.importLocal LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.importLocal}),'%')
order by t.createdate desc
